## load libraries

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(survival)
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
```

## set directories adn source functions for plotting 

```{r}
root_dir <- rprojroot::find_root(rprojroot::has_dir(".git"))
analyses_dir <- file.path(root_dir, "analyses", "tp53_nf1_score")
plots_dir <- file.path(analyses_dir, "plots")

## source this script for plotting
source(file.path(analyses_dir, "utils", "survival_models.R"))
```

## load files

```{r}
hist <- readr::read_tsv(file.path(root_dir, "data", "Hope-GBM-histologies.tsv"))
tp53_score <- readr::read_tsv(file.path(analyses_dir, "results", "tp53_altered_status.tsv"))


## combine histologies, tp53_score table and molecular_subtypes together
tp53_survival <- hist %>%
  ## remove seven samples with wrong HGG diagnosis
  filter(!sample_id %in% c("7316-1723", "7316-1746", "7316-194", "7316-212", "7316-2151", "7316-2857", "7316-4844")) %>%
  ## remove c3 samples as these sample does not have the tp53 score or harmonized clinical info
  filter(!grepl("^C3", Kids_First_Biospecimen_ID)) %>%
  ## filter out normal samples as they do not have a molecular subtype
  filter(sample_type != "Normal") %>%
  left_join(tp53_score, by = "sample_id") %>%
  select(sample_id, tp53_score, tp53_altered, 
         OS_days, OS_status, EFS_days, EFS_event_type, 
         reported_gender, race, age_at_diagnosis_days, 
         molecular_subtype) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(sample_id)) %>%
  ## change NA in molecular_subtype and reported gender to "not reported"
  mutate(molecular_subtype = case_when(is.na(molecular_subtype) ~ "not reported", 
                                       TRUE ~ molecular_subtype)) %>%
  mutate(reported_gender = replace_na(reported_gender, "not reported")) %>%
  distinct()

head(tp53_survival)

```
### generate binned tp53 score and age and convert OS_days to OS_years for latter use

```{r}
tp53_survival <- tp53_survival %>%
  mutate(OS_years = (OS_days/365.25), 
         binned_age = case_when(age_at_diagnosis_days >= 0 & 
                                  age_at_diagnosis_days < (15 * 365.25) ~ "0-15", 
                                
                                age_at_diagnosis_days >= (15 * 365.25) & 
                                  age_at_diagnosis_days < (26 * 365.25) ~ "15-26", 
                                
                                age_at_diagnosis_days >= (26 * 365.25) & 
                                  age_at_diagnosis_days < (40 * 365.25) ~ "26-40",
                                
                                age_at_diagnosis_days >= (40 * 365.25)  ~ ">40", 
                                TRUE ~ "not reported")) %>% 
  mutate(binned_tp53 = case_when(tp53_score >= 0 & tp53_score < 0.25 ~ "1 quantile", 
                                 tp53_score >= 0.25 & tp53_score < 0.5 ~ "2 quantile", 
                                 tp53_score >= 0.5 & tp53_score < 0.75 ~ "3 quantile", 
                                 tp53_score >= 0.75 & tp53_score <= 1 ~ "4 quantile", 
                                 TRUE ~ "no tp53 score")) 
  

```

## test if there is a correlation between age and tp53 score

```{r}
## function to print the formula of linear regression 
lm_eqn <- function(df, x, y){
    m <- lm(y ~ x, df);
    eq <- substitute(italic(y) == a + b %.% italic(x)*","~~italic(r)^2~"="~r2, 
         list(a = format(unname(coef(m)[1]), digits = 2),
              b = format(unname(coef(m)[2]), digits = 2),
             r2 = format(summary(m)$r.squared, digits = 3)))
    as.character(as.expression(eq));
}

ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = age_at_diagnosis_days, y = tp53_score)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_text(y = 0.05, x = 12000, 
            label = lm_eqn(tp53_survival, x= tp53_survival$age_at_diagnosis_days, y = tp53_survival$tp53_score), 
            parse = TRUE)
  
```

## The distribution of TP53 score between age range and tp53 score 

```{r}
ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = binned_age, y = tp53_score, color = binned_age)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, alpha = 0.5) + 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = list(c("0-15", "15-26"), c("0-15", "26-40"), c("15-26", "26-40")))

```

## The distribution of TP53 score between male and female 

```{r}
ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = reported_gender, y = tp53_score)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, alpha = 0.5) + 
  stat_compare_means(comparisons = list(c("Female", "Male")))

```

## The distribution of TP53 score among different races 

```{r}
ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = factor(race, levels = c("White", "Asian",
```

## add two new columns with simplified molecular subtype

```{r}

tp53_survival <- tp53_survival %>% 
  mutate(broad_mol = case_when(grepl(",", molecular_subtype) ~ 
                                 substr(molecular_subtype, 1, regexpr(",", molecular_subtype) - 1), 
                               TRUE ~ molecular_subtype), 
         mol_subtype_without_tp53 = gsub(", TP53", "", molecular_subtype)) %>% 
  mutate(broad_mol = case_when(grepl("IHG", broad_mol) ~ "IHG", 
                               TRUE ~ broad_mol), 
         mol_subtype_without_tp53 = case_when(grepl("IHG", mol_subtype_without_tp53) ~ "IHG", 
                               TRUE ~ mol_subtype_without_tp53))
  
table(tp53_survival$broad_mol)
```

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = broad_mol, y = tp53_score)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, alpha = 0.5) 
p2 <- ggplot(tp53_survival, aes(x = mol_subtype_without_tp53, y = tp53_score)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.3, alpha = 0.5) 

p1 / p2

```

## plot the Kaplan–Meier survival curve on 
## molecular_subtype, gender, binned age and binned tp53 score

```{r}
var <- c("reported_gender", "binned_age", "binned_tp53")

for(i in var){
  
  kap_OS <- survival_analysis(
  metadata = tp53_survival, 
  ind_var = i,
  test = "kap.meier",
  metadata_sample_col = "sample_id",
  days_col = "OS_days",
  status_col = "OS_status"
  )
print(i)
  plot <- plotKM(model = kap_OS, 
       variable = i, 
       combined = FALSE, 
       title = i)

  ggsave(file.path(plots_dir, paste0("KM_", i, ".pdf")), plot, 
       width = 10, height = 6, units = "in", 
       device = "pdf")
}

```

## calculate hazard ratio using tp53_score as continuous variat, reported gender, broad_mol and binned_age.

```{r}
tp53_survival <- tp53_survival %>% 
  mutate(broad_mol = factor(broad_mol, levels = c("HGG", "DMG", "DHG",  "IHG", "PXA")))

survival_cox <- fit_save_model(tp53_survival, 
                                    terms = "tp53_score + reported_gender + broad_mol + binned_age", 
                                    output_file = file.path(analyses_dir, "results", "tp53_score+reported_gender+broad_mol+binned_age.RDS"), 
                                    model_type = "multivariate")

model <- read_rds(file.path(analyses_dir, "results", "tp53_score+reported_gender+broad_mol+binned_age.RDS"))

plotForest(model)

```

## Take a look at two subtypes, `HGG, H3 WT` and `DGM, H3 K28`

```{r}
h3_wt <- tp53_survival %>% 
  filter(grepl("HGG, H3 wildtype", molecular_subtype))

dgm <- tp53_survival %>%
  filter(grepl("DMG, H3 K28", molecular_subtype))

```
